Package com.jcabi.log.decors

Built-in decors.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DomDecor
    Decorates XML Document.
    ExceptionDecor
    Decorates an exception.
    ListDecor
    Format list.
    MsDecor
    Decorate time interval in milliseconds.
    NanoDecor
    Decorate time interval in nanoseconds.
    ObjectDecor
    Format internal structure of an object.
    SecretDecor
    Decorator of a secret text.
    SizeDecor
    Size decorator.
    TextDecor
    Decorator of a text.
    TypeDecor
    Decorator of a type.
